xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 16 April 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu, have you seen my draft application ? 01:09 <froggy> has joined #ccm 01:09 <froggy> sdumitriu:ping 02:52 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 03:09 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 03:27 <joshedgcomb> has joined #ccm 03:52 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:07 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:11 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 04:49 <froggy> has joined #ccm 05:13 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 06:29 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 09:04 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 10:20 <qwebirc39820> has joined #ccm 10:50 <froggy> has joined #ccm 11:50 <camelia_> has joined #ccm 11:53 <camelia_> Hello, my name is Camelia and I'm interested in contributing to PhenoTips with the project: Visualization and analysis of patient data for the diagnosis of genetic disorders 11:53 <sdumitriu> Hi camelia_ 11:54 <camelia_> Last Friday I downloaded the source code and tried to build it according to the instructions. The build was successful overall (with some warnings along the way). 11:54 <sdumitriu> I was going to write to you today 11:54 <camelia_> Thank You! 11:55 <sdumitriu> Sorry, but last week was very busy 11:55 <camelia_> I ran the build procedure once again and redirected the output to file so that I can send You the messages, if You agree 11:56 <sdumitriu> You can pastebin the output, that's easier 11:56 <sdumitriu> pastebin.com 11:59 <camelia_> http://pastebin.com/tpVk21UQ 12:00 <sdumitriu> I think the problem might be duplicated jars... 12:00 <sdumitriu> Which jvm are you using? 12:01 <camelia_> java version "1.7.0_03" Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.7.0_03-b05) Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 22.1-b02, mixed mode, sharing) 12:01 <p1f> has joined #ccm 12:01 <sdumitriu> Hey p1f 12:02 <p1f> hi! 12:02 <sdumitriu> Were you complaining about classpath errors too? 12:02 <p1f> yeap) 12:02 <sdumitriu> Good, just investigating that with camelia_ 12:02 <p1f> still without any improvements.. 12:03 <p1f> Which configuration do you use for development? ./standalone or smth different? 12:04 <sdumitriu> Yes, standalone 12:04 <sdumitriu> It's the easiest 12:05 <sdumitriu> But for production I usually end up with tomcat/mysql with a httpd/mod_proxy_ajp in front 12:08 <camelia_> Other than the build, that eventually will succeed, I would like to ask You some questions in order to understand better the projectsome 12:09 <p1f> What is strange, Jetty reports: No JSP Support for /, did not find org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet 12:09 <sdumitriu> Try this: 12:09 <sdumitriu> From distribution/standalone/target/phenotips-*/webapps/phenotips/WEB-INF/lib remove: 12:09 <sdumitriu> guava-12.0.jar 12:09 <sdumitriu> plexus-utils-2.0.6.jar 12:09 <sdumitriu> rome-0.9.jar 12:09 <sdumitriu> woodstox-core-asl-4.1.1.jar 12:09 <sdumitriu> asm-4.1.jar 12:09 <sdumitriu> p1f: That's normal, we don't need JSP, but the log is hard to remove 12:10 <sdumitriu> camelia_: The build warnings are OK, there's nothing we can do about velocity-tools, it's an older release done before they switched to Maven 12:11 <sdumitriu> It's harmless 12:11 <sdumitriu> After you removed those jars, does it work? 12:12 <p1f> ok, but doesn't it affect ./solr -- Solr Admin? seems like it requires Servlets.. 12:12 <p1f> or you just don't use it?))) 12:12 <sdumitriu> Solr also doesn't require JSP 12:12 <camelia_> i'm trying Your advice and I'll tell You the result in a couple of minutes 12:12 <sdumitriu> Servlets are different, they're the only thing that a webapp really needs 12:13 <sdumitriu> Also, can you check if you have WEB-INF/lib/emory-util-classloader-2.1.jar 12:15 <p1f> I do have one here: ./webapps/phenotips/WEB-INF/lib/emory-util-classloader-2.1.jar 12:23 <p1f> Do you get the same "Failed to execute the [velocity] macro": java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/xwiki/classloader/URIClassLoader$URIResourceFinder exceptions? 12:24 <sdumitriu> I don't 12:24 <sdumitriu> It's always working for me 12:24 <sdumitriu> p1f: What version of Java are you using? 12:24 <sdumitriu> java -version 12:25 <p1f> java version "1.7.0_17" 12:25 <p1f> linux mint 11 12:25 <p1f> tried also on ubuntu 11.10 12:25 <sdumitriu> I have the same 12:26 <p1f> with the same oracle jdk 12:26 <sdumitriu> mvn -version 12:26 <p1f> 3.0.3 12:26 <sdumitriu> I have 3.0.4 12:26 <p1f> it failed building with mvn yesterday, so I installed mvn3 12:27 <sdumitriu> pastebin the output of: 12:27 <sdumitriu> ls -1 webapps/phenotips/WEB-INF/lib 12:29 <p1f> pastebin.com/VWKEH9bM 12:29 <p1f> I removed the files you mentioned above 12:31 <p1f> I'll be AFK for 1.5hour 12:33 <sdumitriu> Aha, found it 12:34 <sdumitriu> It seems that your emory-utils-classloader-2.1.jar is different than mine 12:39 <sdumitriu> camelia_, p1f: rm ~/.m2/repository/edu/emory/mathcs/util/emory-util-classloader/2.1/emory-util-classloader-2.1.jar 12:39 <sdumitriu> Then mvn clean install everything 12:39 <sdumitriu> It should fix the problem 12:39 <camelia_> I still get the velocity related error. You said that it might be the emory-util-classloader-2.1.jar the cause? 12:39 <sdumitriu> Yes 12:40 <camelia_> ok I'll start it all over again the mvn clean install and tell You the result 12:41 <sdumitriu> Don't forget to rm that broken file 12:49 <sdumitriu> I'll be back in 15 minutes 13:10 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 13:32 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:41 <camelia_> has joined #ccm 13:41 <camelia_> I restarted from the very beginning and I still get the velocity macro error in the browser 13:42 <camelia_> the new build process output is at http://pastebin.com/aX7RrfXp 13:43 <camelia_> while the error in the browser is at http://pastebin.com/b3ZeFeAG 13:46 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:50 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:55 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:56 <froggy> has joined #ccm 13:59 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:03 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:07 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:11 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:13 <sdumitriu1> camelia_: Are you sure you removed the broken jar first? 14:13 <sdumitriu1> stat ~/.m2/repository/edu/emory/mathcs/util/emory-util-classloader/2.1/emory-util-classloader-2.1.jar 14:14 <camelia_> and here is a screenshot of the error in browser: http://picpaste.com/error16apr2013-cBJxhy7h.bmp 14:15 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:17 <p1f> Woohooo! 14:18 <p1f> i rm'd the library 14:18 <p1f> mvn3 clean && mvn3 install 14:18 <p1f> now it's loaded 14:18 <sdumitriu1> p1f: Perfect, thanks for the help nailing this down 14:19 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:22 <p1f> Can I somehow populate the DB automatically? 14:22 <sdumitriu1> With random patients? 14:23 <sdumitriu1> I had a script for that, but unfortunately I didn't save it anywhere... I'll have to redo it 14:25 <p1f> Yes) well, I can do that myself via UI macroses 14:25 <p1f> Just thought, that could be a great idea to have "Populate with demo data" button) 14:25 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 14:25 <sdumitriu1> Yeah. but not in production 14:39 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:41 <p1f> has joined #ccm 14:42 <p1f> How can I launch "Quick Phenotype Search" page? 14:42 <sdumitriu1> WDM? 14:43 <p1f> http://phenotips.cs.toronto.edu/download/PhenoTips/WebHome/phenotips_phsearch_yn.png 14:43 <p1f> I guess, I just figured that out 14:44 <p1f> just started typing in the field 14:45 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:49 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:53 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:55 <joshedgcomb> has joined #ccm 14:57 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:01 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:06 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:08 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:40 <camelia_> has joined #ccm 15:41 <camelia_> I tried on an Ubuntu system,having installed maven 3.0.4 and it's the same velocity macro error . 15:42 <camelia_> in browser http://picpaste.com/error16apr2013-cBJxhy7h.bmp 15:53 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 16:00 <camelia_> I'm still trying to make it work.One thing I observed is that the only POM to be downloaded during build is that for velocity tools 16:01 <camelia_> Downloading: http://nexus.cs.toronto.edu/nexus/content/repositories/releases/velocity-tools/velocity-tools/1.4/velocity-tools-1.4.pom 16:01 <sdumitriu1> stat ~/.m2/repository/edu/emory/mathcs/util/emory-util-classloader/2.1/emory-util-classloader-2.1.jar 16:06 <camelia1> has joined #ccm 16:06 <camelia1> stat ~/.m2/repository/edu/emory/mathcs/util/emory-util-classloader/2.1/emory-util-classloader-2.1.jar File: `/home/camelia/.m2/repository/edu/emory/mathcs/util/emory-util-classloader/2.1/emory-util-classloader-2.1.jar' Size: 26307 Blocks: 56 IO Block: 4096 regular file Device: 803h/2051d Inode: 6883059 Links: 1 Access: (0644/-rw-r--r--) Uid: ( 1000/ camelia) Gid: ( 1000/ camelia) Access: 2013-04-16 22:35:08.000 16:07 <sdumitriu1> It has the wrong size 16:07 <sdumitriu1> Delete that file 16:07 <sdumitriu1> rm ~/.m2/repository/edu/emory/mathcs/util/emory-util-classloader/2.1/emory-util-classloader-2.1.jar 16:08 <camelia1> ok, I deleted it 16:08 <sdumitriu1> Now build again 16:08 <sdumitriu1> During the build it should try to download it again from nexus.cs.toronto.edu 16:15 <joshedgcomb> has joined #ccm 16:16 <camelia1> GREAT!!!!!!!!!!!! 16:16 <camelia1> NOW IT WORKS. THANK YOU!!!!! 16:20 <camelia__> has joined #ccm 16:21 <sdumitriu1> Great to hear that 16:23 <camelia1> has joined #ccm 16:31 <camelia__> how is HyperSQL used in PhenoTips? Is there a diagram of the tables and their relationships available? 16:32 <sdumitriu1> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/DatabaseSchema 16:32 <sdumitriu1> PhenoTips is developed on top of the XWiki platform 16:37 <camelia__> ok, Thank You, I 'll study it and I'll come back tommorow evening to continue our discussion. 16:38 <camelia__> Good evening! 16:39 <sdumitriu1> Bye 16:44 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 17:16 <sdumitriu1> Hi joshedgcomb 17:17 <sdumitriu1> Marc (the main mentor for the projects you're interested in) isn't here unfortunately 17:18 <sdumitriu1> He'll get back to you by email shortly 19:36 <vshivam> has joined #ccm 20:01 <joshedgcomb> has joined #ccm 20:05 <RushabhM_> has joined #ccm 20:06 <RushabhM_> Any mentors around? 20:25 <vshivam_> has joined #ccm 20:45 <sdumitriu> Hi RushabhM_ 20:45 <sdumitriu> Yes 21:50 <joshedgcomb> Ok, that's great. Thanks sdumitriu 22:36 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 22:47 <ricardo3889> has joined #ccm 22:48 <ricardo3889> Hi 22:49 <ricardo3889> Sorry to bother, but I have a question on Phenotips and I don't know if anyone of you could help me out 22:57 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 23:07 <qwebirc34317> has joined #ccm 23:13 <qwebirc34317> has left #ccm
